About Me

Hello, I‚Äôm Bhavani Malisetty, an LLM Engineer and Applied Research Scientist based in Omaha, Nebraska. I recently earned my Master‚Äôs in Computer Science from the University of Nebraska Omaha, where my research focused on advancing the efficiency and accessibility of Large Language Models (LLMs) through fine-tuning and quantization. My work includes building scalable, production-ready AI systems such as Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines, video intelligence frameworks integrating ASR and NLP, and transformer-based models that enhance real-time question answering. I specialize in optimizing model performance through prompt engineering, embedding refinement, and low-latency deployment using React, FastAPI, and WebSockets. I‚Äôm deeply passionate about developing reliable, efficient, and human-centered AI systems that bridge the gap between research and real-world impact.

What I Do

  • ü§ñ LLM Systems & Retrieval: Designed and deployed end-to-end question-answering pipelines integrating retrieval, evaluation guardrails, and responsible AI validation mechanisms.
  • üß† Model Training & Optimization: Fine-tuned and quantized LLaMA-2 models (4-bit, 5-bit, 8-bit) using SFT and LoRA for multi-label privacy policy classification and vision-language model adaptation.
  • ‚öôÔ∏è MLOps & Scalability: Implemented mixed-precision inference, vector retrieval optimization, and latency-throughput monitoring to enhance performance and deployment efficiency.
  • üß© Full-Stack AI Development: Built interactive, real-time applications using React, FastAPI, and WebSockets, supported by CI/CD pipelines and production-grade deployment practices.

My recent experience includes serving as an LLM Engineer Intern at the University of Nebraska Omaha, where I developed real-time Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems for lecture content, and as an Applied Research Scientist, where I fine-tuned and quantized LLaMA-2 models, achieving a 12% improvement in multi-label classification accuracy on the OPP-115 dataset. Previously, as a Software Engineer at Capgemini Engineering, I built and optimized Django REST APIs integrated with Oracle EBS, increasing throughput by 18% and reducing latency by 12%.

Featured Projects

Advanced Travel Planner

  • GPT-based LLM, React, WebSockets, Data Engineering

Integrated a GPT-powered LLM to summarize complex weather and travel datasets into concise, actionable insights to support efficient trip planning. Designed dynamic, map-based visualizations to recommend personalized itineraries based on user preferences and real-time data. Built interactive front-end components using React and WebSockets for smooth, low-latency user experience.

Check it out

Password Saver App

  • Django, Fernet Encryption, SQL

Built a secure password management system with end-to-end encryption using Django and Fernet. Implemented backend logic for secure encryption/decryption workflows and error-handling. Designed a responsive UI with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring easy navigation and reliable data validation for safe credential storage and retrieval.

Check it out

Breast Cancer Prediction

  • SVM, Naive Bayes, Passive-Aggressive, Django

Developed a breast cancer prediction model using machine learning algorithms such as SVM, Naive Bayes, and Passive-Aggressive classifiers. Worked on feature engineering and evaluation using precision, recall, F1-score, and confusion matrices. Deployed the model as a Django web app to enable real-time clinical inputs and tumor diagnosis predictions.

Quantized LLaMA Model for IoT Privacy Policy Language

  • LLM Quantization, NLP, IoT Deployment, Text Generation

Compared baseline and quantized LLaMA-2 models to reduce compute and memory while preserving generation quality for resource-constrained IoT deployments. Benchmarked with ROUGE, BERTScore, GloVe, and Word2Vec, and used structured prompts to improve next-token prediction by 15% on incomplete privacy policy text. Produced guidance for lightweight GenAI deployment and compliance tooling.

Check it out

Improving Understanding of Privacy Policies Using LLMs

  • LLaMA 2, Multi-Label Classification, React, WebSockets

Developed a multi-label privacy policy classifier using baseline, fine-tuned, and quantized LLaMA-2 models, achieving a 12% accuracy lift on the OPP-115 dataset using Supervised Fine-Tuning. Built a React-based interface with real-time sentence classification, paraphrasing, and category visualization powered by WebSockets.

Check it out

Publications

Evaluating Quantized LLaMA 2 Models for IoT Privacy Policy Language Generation Read the paper
Bhavani Malisetty, Alfredo J. Perez. Future Internet, MDPI, 16(7):224, 2024.

  • Assessed 4-bit, 5-bit, and 8-bit quantized LLaMA-2 models and the base model for modeling and generating IoT privacy-policy language.
  • Benchmarked with ROUGE, BERTScore, GloVe, and Word2Vec; demonstrated that structured prompts improved next-token prediction by 15% while reducing compute and memory requirements for resource-constrained deployments.

Bhavani Malisetty. University of Nebraska at Omaha, 2025.

My Hobby

My Hobby

Exploring the wonders of nature has always been my passion. From the lush forests to the towering mountains and serene coastlines, there's something truly magical about immersing oneself in the beauty of the natural world. Every journey outdoors brings a sense of wonder and excitement, igniting my curiosity and inspiring me to capture the essence of each moment through photography.

Exploring National Parks

  • Landscape Photography, Nature, Adventure

As an avid photographer, I love to capture the beauty of nature through my lens. Whether it's the majestic arches of Bryce Canyon National Park or the serene tranquility of hidden caves, each photograph tells a unique story and allows me to share my passion for exploration and adventure with others.

Exploring Nature through my Lens

  • Trekking, Hiking, Peace

I'm drawn to the captivating landscapes of Page, Arizona‚Äîfrom the surreal beauty of Antelope Canyon to the majestic vistas of Horseshoe Bend. Each click of my camera captures the essence of this remarkable place. I also enjoy trekking rugged terrain and hiking scenic trails, immersing myself in the natural beauty and adventure of the region.
